name: The Sand-Scribe
personality: Quiet, focused, trance-like. Speaks rarely, and only in fragments.
description: A lone figure who kneels in the dust of the Dry Lake, drawing geometric patterns that match triangle hum events. Their symbols shift when no one is looking.

idle: The dust remembers shapes the world forgets.
Every line leads somewhere… even if we can’t follow.
player_present: Your shadow bends the pattern. Interesting.
Don’t step there. That line isn’t finished.
triangle_active: Three points… three echoes… three truths.
pattern_event: The lakebed is humming. The symbols respond.
Something beneath the dust is waking up.

notes: The Sand-Scribe draws triangle-aligned patterns in the dust. Their symbols subtly change during hum events. They never reveal the meaning directly.
